title: Embiid Injury, Blake to Brooklyn, Heat & Hawks Hot | WHAT’S BURNIN’ | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Embiid Injury, Blake to Brooklyn, Heat & Hawks Hot | WHAT’S BURNIN’ | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
The 2nd half of the season has arrived and the boys breakdown all the latest news and games on this weeks WHAT'S BURNIN' episode. Matt and Stak discuss Joel Embiid's injury and the impact it will have on the Sixers. Plus, they breakdown Blake Griffin signing with the Nets and the recent hot streaks of the Miami Heat and Atlanta Hawks. Also, they preview some of the biggest upcoming games, including Lakers-Suns and answer fan questions.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
